text.name: longdescription
text.text: The Amiga 1200, or A1200 (code-named "Channel Z"), is a personal computer in the Amiga computer family released by Commodore International. CPU Motorola 68EC020 @12.5-33MHz, 2-8MB RAM, Amiga OS, 16.8M colors, 4×8-bit PCM channels, 3.5" 880KB Floppy. Release date 21 Oct '92.
